name: Checkbox
description: Checkbox component for selection states. Supports checked, unchecked, and indeterminate states. Extends MUI Checkbox with custom styling.

props.name: checked
props.description: If true, the component is checked

props.name: disabled
props.description: If true, the component is disabled

props.name: indeterminate
props.description: If true, the checkbox is indeterminate

props.name: onChange
props.description: Callback fired when the state is changed

examples.title: Basic

migrationExamples.description: Replace MUI Checkbox with design system Checkbox

accessibility.screenReaderNotes: Checkbox state is announced, indeterminate state is announced as mixed

whenNotToUse: For single selection from options (use Radio instead)
bestPractices: Use indeterminate for parent checkboxes with mixed children
commonPatterns: Table row selection with header checkbox
